meta.description: Experience authentic Indian cuisine at Sindia in Sienna, Italy. Enjoy a variety of traditional dishes made with fresh ingredients.
meta.title: Sindia - Authentic Indian Cuisine

about.title: About Sindia
about.description: Sindia is an authentic Indian restaurant located in the heart of Sienna, Italy. We bring the flavors of India to your table, combining traditional recipes with fresh local ingredients.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you! For reservations, questions, or general inquiries, please get in touch.

footer.title: Sindia Ristorante
footer.subtitle: Authentic Indian Cuisine in Sienna, Italy

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.description: Discover our selection of authentic Indian dishes, crafted with the finest ingredients to bring the flavors of India to Sienna.

feedback.text: Absolutely loved the atmosphere at Sindia. The flavors were spot on, and the presentation was delightful! Can’t wait to return.
feedback.author: - Marco T.

feedback.text: A beautiful taste of India in the heart of Sienna. Authentic food, warm ambiance, and wonderful service. Highly recommended!
feedback.author: - Laura R.

feedback.text: Sindia offers the best Indian food experience in town. The spices, the aroma, everything felt like I was transported to India.
feedback.author: - Giovanni S.
